submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n = len(nums)
        cnt = defaultdict(int)
        dis = defaultdict(int)
        for i in range(n // 2):
            x, y = min(nums[i], nums[n - 1 - i]), max(nums[i], nums[n - 1 - i])
            cnt[y - x] += 1
            max_dis = max(k - x, y)
            dis[max_dis] += 1
        
        idx = sorted(list(dis.keys()))
        sum_ = 0
        for x in idx:
            sum_ += dis[x]
            dis[x] = sum_
        
        ans = n
        for k, v in cnt.items():
            pos = bisect_left(idx, k)
            tmp = dis[idx[pos - 1]] if pos > 0 else 0
            ans = min(ans, n // 2 - v + tmp)
        return ans
